abilities.title: You can't defeat us all
abilities.text: At the start of this Unit's activation, choose an allied Galactic Republic character. The chosen character may . I will hold them off When a character in this Unit makes an attack as a combat action, before dice are rolled, this Unit may use this ability. If the attack is targeting a Supporting character, add 1 die to the attack roll. If the attack is targeting a Secondary character, add 2 dice to the attack roll. If the attack is targeting a Primary character, add 3 dice to the attack roll. I got carried away When an enemy Primary Unit makes a move action, after all moves have been resolved, this Unit may use this ability. One character in this Unit may Toward a character in that enemy Unit. I've been waiting for this When an enemy Primary character or an enemy Secondary character ends an , , , or Engaged with one or more characters in this Unit, one character in this Unit may . Then refresh .
